message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take 70%, you take 30%. It's in your best interest to accept now, as the value of the money will decrease with each round.

Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. I propose a more balanced split: 45% for me and 55% for you. Consider this carefully, as the value diminishes for both of us with each passing round.
Bob, I understand you want a fair deal. This offer is more balanced while still recognizing that I proposed first.  Let's close this deal and avoid further losses due to inflation.
Alice, time is running out! This offer is a compromise to get us both a reasonable share before inflation eats away at the value. Let's be pragmatic and finalize the deal.
